oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Comparison of bolt penetration depth by lowcost penetrating captive-bolt devices used for cattle euthanasia on the farm
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Frazer, S.
Denicourt, M.
DesCoteaux, L.
Masseau, I.
Rousseau, M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Comparative studies are lacking to guide low-cost penetrating captive-bolt device (PCB) selection for on-farm cattle euthanaÂ­sia. This study aimed to compare bolt penetration depth (BPD) of 3 such devices available in Canada. We hypothesized that the cheapest PCB would have a lower BPD than the higher cost PCBs tested.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; No. 56 (2023): 2023 Annual Conference Proceedings ; 198
